Network systems and data analysts, and medical scientists are the fastest growing occupations, but, despite the focus on`` knowledge'' jobs, the great majority of job openings will be in the low tech, non-professional positions, in jobs such as personal and home care aides, retail salespersons, cashiers, waiters and waitresses, and food preparation workers, Bernick concludes.
